thread.title: Connor McDavid keeps cool ahead of National Hockey League debut
thread.title_full: Connor McDavid keeps cool ahead of National Hockey League debut

author: MARTY KLINKENBERG
title: Connor McDavid keeps cool ahead of National Hockey League debut
text:
Hockey St. Louis Blues defencemen Carl Gunnarsson, left, and Kevin Shattenkirk double-team Edmonton Oilers phenom Connor McDavid during the first period of his NHL debut at the Scottrade Center in St. Louis on Oct. 8. (Jasen Vinlove/USA Today Sports) St. Louis Blues defencemen Carl Gunnarsson, left, and Kevin Shattenkirk double-team Edmonton Oilers phenom Connor McDavid during the first period of his NHL debut at the Scottrade Center in St. Louis on Oct. 8.(Jasen Vinlove/USA Today Sports) Connor McDavid keeps cool ahead of National Hockey League debut Add to ...
